text: Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua ghaze, “Ia oraki, me fomɨra kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Ia uan namakabagh ifongegh, egh pazɨ uan apanibar amu.’(5:43) Mɨgɨrɨgɨar uan akar gumazibara ifongeghamim Wok Pris 19:18ɨn iti. Ezɨ akar uan apanibagh ifongeghan koghamim itir danganim e a gɨfozir puvatɨ. Pura Lo 7:2, ko 20:16; koma Song 139:21-22ɨn gan.
